name: My-favorite-recipe
body:
# My-Favorite-Recipe
### Nutella Ice Cream
 Here is a recipe for a homemade ice cream.Its so delicious and can make in a short time.
        Feel free to experiment with it.
### Ingredients
* Heavy whipping cream – 473 ml  (Around 2 cups), chilled
* Vanilla extract – 1 tsp 
* Sweetened condensed milk – 1 can (14 oz), chilled
* Nutella – 1/2 cup
* Chopped almonds, mini chocolate chipsor marshmallows – 1/4 cup each (optional)

### Method
1. Combine condensed milk and nutella in a bowl. Whisk until smooth. Set aside until ready to use.
1. In a large bowl, combine heavy whipping cream and vanilla extract. Using an electric hand mixer at medium-high speed, beat for about 5 – 6 minutes until medium peaks form. Add nutella and continue to beat for 20-30 seconds, scraping in between. Stir in the chopped almonds, mini chocolate chips or marshmallows, if using. Transfer to a freezer-safe container and freeze for 5 – 6 hrs or until firm. Enjoy! overnight.
